page.title: 17A CHILD OF THE ARMY
page.content: ARMY LIFE ISN'T AS BAD AS WHAT IT IS MADE OUT TO BE. A LOT OF CHILDREN WOUDN'T HAVE BEEN TO SO MANY DIFFERENT PLACES IF THEIR PARENTS WERE NOT CONNECTED WITH THE ARMY. YOUR FATHER OR MOTHER WOULD HAVE TO BE VERY LUCKY TO GET A POSTING OVERSEAS. A LOT OF PEOPLE THINK THAT BEING IN THE ARMY WOULD RUIN YOUR SCHOOL LIFE, BUT MOST ARMY BASES HAVE SCHOOLS ON THEM. BEING IN THE FORCES YOU MEET A LOT OF NEW AND OLD FRIENDS. THE WORST THING ABOUT IT, IS THAT YOU HAVE TO LEAVE YOUR FRIENDS BEHIND WHEN YOU GO AWAY.
